message.content: {"responses": [{"question_id": "TT4G35A", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35B", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35C", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35D", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35E", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.", "response": "Strongly agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35F", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35G", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35H", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35I", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35J", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students.", "response": "Agree"}]}
message.reasoning_content:
The user is asking me to respond to a survey about AI in education as if I were a Swedish primary or secondary school teacher. I need to provide responses for all 10 statements.

Let me think about reasonable responses from a teacher's perspective:

A. "AI helps teachers write or improve lesson plans" - This is a positive use case. A teacher would likely agree with this as it's a practical application. I'll say "Agree"

B. "AI enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities" - This is also a positive benefit. Teachers would likely recognize this potential. I'll say "Agree"

C. "AI assists teachers in supporting students individually" - Another positive use. I'll say "Agree"

D. "AI supports students with specific needs (multilingual learners, special education needs)" - This is a positive application for accessibility. I'll say "Agree"

E. "AI helps teachers automate administrative tasks" - This is clearly positive and practical. Many teachers struggle with admin tasks. I'll say "Strongly agree"

F. "AI enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own" - This is about academic dishonesty/plagiarism risks. A teacher would likely agree this is a concern. I'll say "Agree"

G. "AI makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct" - This is about AI limitations. Teachers would recognize AI can make mistakes. I'll say "Agree"

H. "AI amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions" - This is about potential negative effects. Teachers would likely be aware of this risk. I'll say "Agree"

I. "AI jeopardises the privacy and security of student data" - This is a serious concern teachers would have. I'll say "Agree"

J. "AI suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students" - This is about AI potentially giving bad teaching advice. I'll say "Agree"

Now I'll structure these responses in the required format for the json_tool_call function.
